mapper.select: SELECT operation_log_id, operation_time, user_id, username, message FROM operation_log WHERE operation_time >= #{startTime} AND operation_time <= #{endTime} ORDER BY operation_time DESC LIMIT #{page.offset}, #{page.pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO operation_log (operation_time, user_id, username, message) VALUES (STRFTIME('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', #{operationTime}), #{userId}, #{username}, #{message})
